ygData.subject: The Book
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that the cats out of the bag for the recipes.  I want to find the last book, I don t know if the info released was from the same person who told me the
ygData.messageBody:
Now that the cats out of the bag for the recipes. I want to find the last
book, I don't know if the info released was from the same person who told
me the recipes, but, the only clue that I got from this person was that
the book was in Steamfront Mountains and NOT in Ak'anon .

Thats all I have got to go on, and he/she will not give me any more info.
I am thinking it may be a timed spawn somewhere. The person who found the
book said it was by some freak accident and that he/she happened apon the
"LOCATION" by accident. He/she also said you need to be patient.

Have fun with this, maybe we can find it out. I don't understand if the
recipe is out why wouldn't this person want to release the info. I dunno
